verses.text: Alleluia. Give thanks to the Lord: for he is good: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
Give thanks to the God of gods: for his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
Give thanks to the Lord of lords: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
To him who alone has wrought great wonders: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
To him who made the heavens by understanding; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
To him who established the earth on the waters; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
To him who alone made great lights; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
The sun to rule the day; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
The moon and the stars to rule the night; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
To him who smote Egypt with their firstborn; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
And brought Israel out of the midst of them; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
With a strong hand, and a high arm: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
To him who divided the Red Sea into parts: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
And brought Israel through the midst of it: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
And overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red Sea: For his mercy endures forever.
To him who led his people through the wilderness: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
To him who smote great kings: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
And slew mighty kings; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
Sihon king of the Amorites: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
And Og king of Bashan: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
And gave their land \add for\add* an inheritance: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
Even an inheritance to Israel his servant: For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
For the Lord remembered us in our low estate; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever:
And redeemed us from our enemies; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
Who gives food to all flesh; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
Give thanks to the God of heaven; For his mercy \add endures\add* forever.
